channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Art Of Architecture
channel.desc: Sir David Chipperfield restores the iconic Neue National Galerie in Berlin in honour of the original architect, Ludig Mies van der Rohe.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Finest Homes explores modern masterpieces and character-filled design, talking to the visionaries who are bringing them to life, as well as the people who live in them.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Garden Heroes
channel.desc: The Garden Heroes experts are visiting 3 gardens under the theme of 'Grow Your Own Way'.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Josefina's LA home is the heart of her Chilean family. The cramped, disjointed flow, and uneven floors on the main level make it hard for Josefina and her family to move around.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Mike shows you how to renovate a beachside home with all the bells and whistles. Plus we visit a multi-million dollar award winning home in Byron Bay.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: Melanie visits a wholesale plant grower that specializes in bedding plants. Linda Galvad gives you the 101 to starting an organic veggie garden.
